name: Kia Carnival
description: Kia Carnival is a MUV which is expected to launch in India in Sep 2024 in the expected price range of Rs. 40.00  - 45.00 Lakh. It is available in 2 variants with 1 transmission option : Automatic. Other key specifications of the Carnival include a ground clearance of 180 mm. and The Carnival is available in 3 colours. Kia Carnival mileage is 13.9 kmpl.
